> [nofish](#comment_896_1J3rJ8ecnwH2EPYa6MrgZttBNc61ACFiCj): Packing a bitcoin, ipfs, namecoin, etc. into one big, monolithic application would reduce the portability of ZeroNet , would use much more resources and by that make it impossible to run on mobile, so there is no plans on doing that. 
> But it's easy to extend ZeroNet by plugins, so anyone can add his/her favorite protocol.

I think it is wrong to consider the P2P network formed by the mobile now. Because the mobile's storage capacity is too small. We must consider a sufficient number of personal computers to form a basic network. To have enough people to use zeronet, in order to have enough personal computers to form the underlying network.

To attract enough people to use, first you must  have an attractive thing. Zerotalk is ok. And the development of zerotalk technology has all have, upload pictures, embed video, set up the administrator, just need to integrate it.

This does not require Packing a bitcoin, ipfs, namecoin, etc. into one big, monolithic application.

If zerotalk builds a basic network, there is a technical problem that has not yet been solved, and the establishment and maintenance of large-scale P2P database. I think this is the real problem and development of zeronet will face to.

For example, from 100000 personal computers constitute zeronet basic network, each computer to take 30G hard drive capacity, 100000X30G = 3000T. So big a P2P database, how to build? How to run How to maintain This is the real problem.

Once zeronet can build a stable base network, the number of personal computers will be far more than 100,000 units. On this basis, is to consider when the mobile to join.

Before the foundation network is established, no matter how smart a person is, no matter how much favorite protocol can increase, will not succeed.

> 
> That example isn't totally right. A network can be very redundant, or have high capacity, but having more of one means having less of the other. You can have more of each, but that's much harder. (this page explains it a little more).
> For example, if there was only one site with a size of 30GB, then the whole network can only store 30GB. I know it's not really like that--but in the real network, just adding up the storage of each device isn't correct.

I know that mobile phone applications are more extensive, but by the personal computer constitute a basic network is more feasible. The advantage of P2P networks lies in the storage space of a large number of personal computers. If you do not make full use of the personal computer's spare storage space, compared with the internet network there is no advantage. Mobile phone can be connected to the server, there is no need to use zeronet.

Streaming data is good idea, but too much attention to it is not necessary. Twister is to rely entirely on streaming data, the result is not received posts. Of course, this problem can be solved, to reduce the distribution of old posts in the node on the line, but this again complicated the problem.

I can see from your reply, you also know that a huge P2P database operation and maintenance is a difficult point.ï¼ˆBut having more of one means having less of the other. You can have more of each, but that's much harder.ï¼‰

> [nofish](#comment_1172_1J3rJ8ecnwH2EPYa6MrgZttBNc61ACFiCj): As far as I know they not blocking peers (yet?), but the trackers. You don't need any software on the computer as the block is based on the IP address (of the trackers).

I don't study the network. I don't understand the structure of the network and I don't understand how the Internet works. But I think that the connection of ZeroNet PEER is nothing more than the following situations:

1ï¼Œ two peers connect to a server at the same time, there is no GFW software on this server, then these two peers can connect.

2ï¼ŒBoth peers are connected to a server at the same time. The GFW software is installed on this server. Therefore, the two peers cannot be connected and GFW prevents the connection.

3ï¼Œa peer is connected to the A server, there is no GFW on the A server, the b peer is connected to the B server, and there is no GFW on the B server. The a peer connects to the B server through the A server and then connects with the b peer.

4ï¼ŒThe a peer is connected to the A server. There is no GFW on the A server. The b peer is connected to the B server. The B server has a GFW. The a peer connects to the B server through the A server, and cannot connect to the b peer and is blocked by the GFW.

5ï¼Œa, b Two peers in the same local area network can obtain connections without using a server.

Since China's Internet is in fact a lot of LANs, because most servers do not have GFW software and only a few servers have GFW software, in most cases zeronets should find peers, and only a few peers should be blocked.

However, the actual situation is that a large number of peers are blocked. What is the reason?

If block is based on the IP address (of the trackers), there are 4 questions:

1ï¼Œwhether the zero network peer must be tracker to connect?

2ï¼ŒDo peers in the same LAN also have to be connected via tracker?

3ï¼ŒUnder the same local area network, two devices respectively accessing the Internet cannot find the peer and cannot connect to the tracker. But at the same time, networking can be connected to each other through local discovery. Why is that?

4ï¼Œsome sites can not connect to any peer with one device, and 2 devices can connect to the peers when they access the Internet at the same time. Why is that?

topic.title: UiServer Websocket error

topic.body: P2P developers should be aware that a large number of old computers are idle.These old computer hard disk is 320G, P2P development should make full use of these old computer hard disk capacity.
topic.title: These old computer hard disk is 320G

topic.body:
For zeronet, as long as we can easily do their own blog, can post, send pictures, can send 10m short video, blog owners have enough space, such as 10g-20g, blog followers can Decided not to take up too much hard disk capacity, such as 1g, so zeronet has been successful.

Forum, social functions can be resolved later.
topic.title: What is the success of zeronet?

topic.body:
Zeroblog build our own blog fairly easy, although the initial node to get some problems, but can be established, the problem can be put into the future optimization.

Zeroblog post no problem, upload pictures are no problem.

Upload MP3 files, sites
Http://127.0.0.1:43110/1C3ah92vYUG7MMxMZ36HerQXNojSZtp2Lb/ do a good job. And can distribute MP3 files.

Upload MP4 files should also be similar, you can solve.

The next step is how much space the blog owner can have, and whether bloggers can control the amount of hard disk usage. 

Zeronet is only a step away from success.
topic.title: Zeronet is only a step away from success

topic.body:
Blog owners have 20G of space is enough, 10G put text and pictures, 10G put video. Each video does not exceed 10M, 1000 video 10G. General personal blog will not have 1000 videos. Personal computer 500G hard drive, with 20G to do blog, accounting for very little space.

Blogger followers will not be interested in all the content of a blog, so only a small amount of hard disk space is required. Such as no more than 1G.

However, we will pay attention to many blogs, 20 blog concern may have 20G. Of course, can adjust the space for each blog size better.

We are concerned about the content of each blog can be stored separately, can also be stored together. The key is to cancel the attention of a blog can delete all its contents. This will not take up too much of our hard disk space.
topic.title: Blog owner 20G is enough

topic.title: Bug report

topic.body:
News sites generally have a few people management, which is the same zero-net blog account to run on several computers.

Several computers on the same account with the blog article, the result is a few computer blog content is not the same.

If the design of the same account can not synchronize data, then this news blog will not run.

The reality is whether the design allows the synchronization of data, due to network reasons, several computers synchronization data is also very difficult, so that news sites can not enter the zero network.

Zero-blog must be designed to copy, merge site data. If you can not synchronize data, just copy and merge the data for the site. This way news sites can enter the zero-net blog.
topic.title: This causes the news site can not enter the zero net blog

topic.title: good  one

topic.body:
For the Chinese people, zeroblog + zerotalk will be able to completely break through the Chinese government's network blockade. Like zerome such a structure, just more functional, more fancy some. For the Chinese people to break through the network blockade, access to information, but no more meaning.

However, the development of zeroblog and zerotalk is much easier than zerome.

Experience tells us that zeronet development, will soon face confrontation with the Chinese government. Zerome's many fancy features of the development, will soon become meaningless.

Zeronet's network infrastructure has a lot of problems. The simplest is that there are many nodes and connections, but there is no data transmission, a large number of files are lost. In the case of network infrastructure there are still many problems, do not pay attention to the network infrastructure, can not attract a large number of Chinese people to participate in the provision of a large number of nodes, how to confront the Chinese government's network blockade?

For Westerners, zeronet such software is a "novelty" that is not a "must" that can be expected in a very long period of time, zeronet in the West will not have a lot of users.

If you compare the development of Linux, zeronet now focus on the development of zerome, should have more than 10 years to be widely used. The early development of linux, there is the involvement of commercial capital, such as "red hat". Are there any commercial capital involved in zeronet now? I'm not clear.
topic.title: Experience tells us

topic.body:
Whenever someone builds a group, the owner of the group will pull into dozens of people. This will provide dozens of nodes for zeronet.

Zerotalk is equivalent to the Chinese people widely used "social group". Generally a group consists of dozens of participants. Like this group in China overwhelming, countless.

Group of basic functions in addition to post, but also to send pictures, and displayed on the home page, but also to send video, can set up the administrator.

As soon as possible to develop the basic functions of zerotalk, the picture displayed on the home page, can be embedded into the video, can set the administrator.

If zerotalk can build 1000 groups, then there are tens of thousands of people, and can provide tens of thousands of nodes.

topic.title: Now the main problem is to connect the node too little, too fixed.
topic.body:
A site even if there are more than 1000 connectable nodes, but the actual connection of the node is generally only 3-5. And as far as I can judge, the 3-5 nodes of this connection are very fixed, each time connecting the same nodes.

This is very difficult to synchronize, one can not be synchronized, it may be a week, or a few weeks can not be synchronized until you connect the 3-5 nodes to update in order to synchronize.

The solution is to increase the number of nodes connected to. There are more than 1000 nodes can be connected, the actual connection of the node should be increased to dozens, or even hundreds of.

Another solution is to constantly replace the connected nodes. You can replace the new connection node every 5 minutes or 10 minutes.

topic.title: 5-step development of zeronet WIFI interconnection
topic.body:
1, the development of two devices, two clients, in the same WIFI device synchronization data.

2, the development of multiple devices multiple clients in the same WIFI device synchronization data.

3, the development of two devices of the two clients in the two can be connected to the WIFI device synchronization data.

4, the development of multiple devices multiple clients in the two can be connected to the WIFI device synchronization data.
5, Multiple clients that develop multiple devices synchronize data on multiple WIFI devices that can be connected.

Synchronize data with WIFI should be very fast, much faster than synchronizing data over the Internet. And should be able to synchronize long video files.

topic.title: It is now possible to focus development on the network infrastructure
topic.body:
Zero-network application level of the basic development can be temporarily stopped, although there are many aspects of the need to develop, you can put into the future development. The basis of the above level of application development can let everyone play.

Long video playback is still a problem, but it is easy to improve, the video file cut to 500K, the problem is solved.

It is now possible to focus development on the network infrastructure. The development of the network infrastructure level is currently 2 points.

1, the development of zero network WIFI interconnection.

2, zeronet network bypass ISP. Now P2P technology is not really P2P, it still depends on the Internet. To enter the zeronet network, you must first connect with the ISP. Otherwise still can not enter zeronet. But this is not necessary, because zeronet data transmission does not require the intervention of the Internet.

There are two other aspects of the development of the network infrastructure level, but can be placed later.

1, increase the number of client connections.

2, to improve the capacity of multiple transmission. Now the transmission between zero-network nodes, almost all of a single node transmission, and did not achieve multiple transmission. Did not reflect the transmission advantages of P2P networks.

topic.title: My view on twister development
topic.body:
In fact, twister is not complicated, is an account corresponding to a block. There is no difference in theory if there is a block that can register 10 accounts. A block corresponds to an account or the corresponding 10 accounts are the same. Corresponding to an account easy to understand.

Twister There are several problems now: It is difficult to receive new tweets; Avatars sometimes have, sometimes not; Repeatedly received a number of tweets, these are caused by same reason. Is the structural design issuesï¼Œnot about code.

In fact, twister is to complicate the simple problem.

An account corresponds to a block, as long as the account of all the information and data are placed in the corresponding block, so Avatar has been there, will not be gone. Will not repeatedly receive some tweets, of course, can receive new tweets.

Because when you focus on an account, all the data in the block corresponding to this account, except the key, is transmitted to you.

However, each person has a different number of tweets, so the size of the block should be different. Some people send a large amount of a day, he needs the corresponding block larger.

Twister can maintain the data every 24 hours, resize all the blocks. To push more blocks to expand adjustment.

Of course, each block needs to be adjusted over time.

The same applies if the size of the blocks must be the same. As long as each block corresponds to a data block. All the information except the key of this block is stored in this corresponding data block, and all the data blocks are adjusted every 24 hours. This is called data maintenance.

In this way, twister existing problems can be solved.

The current development of twister does not require too much storage capacity, this issue should be put into consideration later. Image upload, video upload are solved. Then think about it.

The solution to storage is theoretically not complicated. Bigger data blocks are allocated as P2P databases. Just what is the effect of P2P database, not easy to say.

topic.title: I think the reason for poor transmission is here
topic.body:
To the right of your site of interest, open the menu to see the amount of data uploaded and downloaded by this site.

You can see that the amount of data you upload is very small, no matter how much time you focus on this site, and how long you are online, the upload volume has been very small.It does not matter whether the port is open or not.

That is, you are concerned about a site, and can not help this site to transfer data. Only one node is provided.

In other words, the amount of attention on a site, which is the number of nodes, nothing to do with the data synchronization effect. Only related to whether it is easy to find this site.

In this way, the video becomes very difficult to transmit, because the video data volume is bigger.

topic.title: 3 months to complete satellite WIFI receiver software development
topic.body:
The use of streaming technology to upload data and download data separately, that is, the request sent by the computer to the site and the site to the computer to separate the transmission of data streams.

Upload data, computer requests sent to the website by the VPN transmission, the transmission of these data is small, can use VPN transmission, and the CCP's network blockade is very difficult to block such a small data transmission.

Download data, web site to the computer transmission of web data transmitted by satellite.

In this way, now the computer, mobile phone, set-top box as long as the installation of such software can be directly used satellite WIFI, and does not require new hardware devices.

Of course, this satellite WIFI receiving software can not upload files, just browse the Web, watch the video, listen to music.

topic.title: Local discovery needs improvement
topic.body:
The current local discovery works very well under the same WIFI. But not under the same WIFI, the effect is not good. On my few computers, the local nodes are very different.

In China's big cities, the density of living is very high. There are usually hundreds and thousands of families in a living quarter. And many communities are connected.

The computer network cables of a living area are all centralized and then connected to the outside. It may be connected to a relay station. It may be the server of the connected network access provider. I do not know the specific situation.

I guess that a residential area of â€‹â€‹the Internet in China is a local area network.

There are also 3,000 small county cities in China. A small county town is equivalent to the size of several living quarters in large cities. The size of the area is similar and the population is similar.

I guess the zero-net client nodes in the entire living area can be found using local discovery.

Looking at the network from the scope of a living area, there are no servers in the entire community and there is no GFW. It should be easy to find nodes. In this way, each living community forms a large zero-net network. And can not block the nodes.

topic.title: Twister can be a site for zeronet
topic.body:
As long as the zeronet node can connect to the twister node and can exchange data, the twister can become a site of zeronet.

But twister and zeronet have a fundamental difference, zeronet stores the data you want to browse on your local hard drive, and twister does not store all the data you want to browse. However, twister stores all blockchains on your local hard drive, but the data in the blockchain is not all stored on the local hard drive.

The easiest way to turn a twister into a zeronet site is to store the data in all the blockchains on your local hard drive. At present, the amount of data in twister is not large. This method is ok and feasible.

Another simple method is to store only one month of data in the entire blockchain. Data for more than one month is not stored. This way the site will not be too big.

These two methods are especially desirable in the current zeronet and twister usage, and the network conditions are relatively poor.

After the number of users of zeronet and twister has increased, consider storing data based on each individual's concerns, or running it exactly as if the twister were running.

This can be considered later, because the way the twister works is that the network can be implemented under ideal conditions. The current network is not ideal, causing the twister to not receive tweets.

The more difficult is how the signature of the twister and the signature of the zeronet mutually recognize each other. If there is no mutual recognition, the site owner of the zero network needs to sign the received twister data file, otherwise it cannot be synchronized.

topic.title: Solving the large-scale international refugee tide is actually very easy
topic.body:
There are a large number of refugees in Honduras who want to enter the United States, indicating their longing for the United States. Then Honduras is divided into a region, hosted by the United States, and the United States assigns a governor to the region to implement the American system. All the refugees who want to enter the United States moved into the trusteeship. The refugee problem is solved.

Similarly, a large number of Syrian refugees entered Germany. Syria should draw a region as the German trustee and implement the German system. A large number of refugees entering Germany have moved into the trusteeship. The Syrian refugee problem is also easily resolved.

Again, a large number of refugees from Africa have entered Italy. In Africa, which country has a large number of refugees entering Italy, the country has drawn a region as the Italian trustee and implemented the Italian system. The refugees moved into the trusteeship. This way the African refugee problem is also easily resolved.

The government of a country that produces a large number of refugees has no right to stop the allocation of trusteeships. If management fails, some sovereignty should be surrendered. The division of the trusteeship is led by the international community and the government has no right to decide.

topic.title: Trump and Putin should join forces to make Tibet independent
topic.body:
Tibetâ€™s independence, Chinaâ€™s problems have been solved in half. And this is Putin's willingness to cooperate.

Putin must know that it will not take long for the Russian Far East to be corrupted by the CCP and the environment will be destroyed. Then build a few useless image projects to deceive the ordinary people. This kind of project is a corrupt project, used for corruption and money laundering of the CCP, and of course includes collusion with local Russian officials.

Putin has no good response to this potential crisis. And whether Russia has the ability to deal with this crisis alone is also doubtful.

After Tibetâ€™s independence, this crisis against Russia will be much reduced.

Moreover, Tibet is close to India and has close ties with India. India has long-term friendly relations with Russia. After independence, Tibet has no threat to Russia. Tibet and Mongolia are also very close. Russia and Mongolia have long-term friendly relations. Russia should welcome Tibet's independence.

Tibet and Nepal, not long, North Korea, and Ryukyu, used to be vassal states of Manchu, not administrative areas of Manchu. Tibetâ€™s independence has no obstacles from international law.

Tibet is not a colony of Manchu, so Tibet independence does not need to conduct a referendum on the basis of colonial independence. As long as the Tibetan peopleâ€™s administration, the Tibetan government in exile, announces the abolition of 17 articles signed with the CCP.

Tibetâ€™s own ability to promote independence is very limited and requires the support of the Western world, especially the support of the United States. However, if it can unite with Russia, Tibetâ€™s independence will be much easier.

topic.title: The United States, Japan and Russia join forces to restore Manchuria
topic.body:
Restoring Manchuria Russia will definitely help, because after the founding of Manchuria, China and Russia's Far East region were separated, effectively preventing the possibility of the CCP's large-scale direct entry into Russia. The restoration of Manchuria is also the result that Japan is most willing to see. Japan has previously fostered the independence of Manchuria.

Restoring Manchuria is also very beneficial to the United States. The independence of Manchuriaâ€™s founding of the country separated the direct link between North Korea and the Chinese Communist Party. North Koreaâ€™s nuclear issue is easy to resolve.

In addition to the CCP, Russia, Japan, South Korea, and the United States are all happy to see Manchuria's independent statehood.

Manchu and Daming were originally two countries. In 1644, the Qing Dynasty occupied and annexed Daming and became a country.

When the Revolution of 1911 broke out in 1911, the Manchu regime was facing a collapse. At this time, the North-South reconciliation was held. The Manchu regime and the Southern Provisional Government agreed to retain the royal family and implement the republican system.

What is strange is that the North-South collegiate at that time did not establish a constitutional monarchy, but created a Republic monarchy.

As a result, the Chinese-made Republic monarchy was naturally and quickly failed.

Of course, all the contracts at the time of the North-South collegiate, the agreement will be void. The Chinese seem to have never considered to comply with the contract.

Since all the contracts at the time were invalidated. Then, the fact that Manchu and Daming were originally two countries cannot be denied. It is logical for Manchu to re-establish his own country.

It is very reasonable for the United States, Japan and Russia to join forces to restore Manchuria.

topic.title: I hope the US government can understand that splitting China is better than constitutional reform
topic.body:
Chinaâ€™s split has been inevitable, and even if China implements constitutional reforms, it will split. Instead of first carrying out constitutional reforms and letting the whole of China move toward constitutionalism under constitutionalism, it is unnecessary, and it is also very easy to cause chaos and even war.

In fact, there is an insurmountable obstacle to constitutional reform in China. China's judicial system is the most corrupt system, and it is not used to maintain the rule of law, it is used to maintain the dictatorship of the CCP. If constitutional reform is to be implemented in China, there will first be a problem. Almost all CCP judges will be prosecuted and will be prosecuted for personal bankruptcy. Even most judges will face criminal prosecution.

This is almost impossible to initiate constitutional reforms without changing the regime.

Under the brainwashing of the Chinese Communist Party for nearly 70 years, all Chinese have different degrees of brain damage. If you want to implement constitutional reform in China, the process will be quite long and there will be repeated iterations.

In particular, there is a Red Second-generation Power Group in China, which is a political group of extremist thoughts. The relationship between the group is very close and the energy is very strong. In a unified China, no matter what system is implemented, its influence and destructive power cannot be underestimated.

Most of the fathers of this second generation are from poor areas of China. In a divided China, they can only have strong influence in some poor areas, and they will not have a great influence on developed areas, so their power will be Will naturally die out.

In ancient China, many countries were actually independent states. Especially in southern China, it is just a group of tribes. However, in the early days of these states, there was a co-sponsorship. As for why there was a co-pushing co-owner, when it appeared, it was impossible to know.

A unified China was formed after a brutal war that took more than 500 years. Chinaâ€™s move to split is actually only a return to primitive justice, and there is no conflict with modern political civilization.

Especially in Tibet, Xinjiang, and now the three northeastern provinces, until the Ming Dynasty was not China's territory. Tibet is a very old independent country that became a vassal state during the Manchu period.

The United Statesâ€™ attempt to help China develop its economy and then the CCPâ€™s efforts to abandon the autocratic dictatorship has failed. There is no need to try again. The dictatorship of the CCP will not change.

Splitting China can gain Russia's support, which is easier to achieve than trying to change the CCP's authoritarian system.

Russia does not want to have a strong, unified, unreasonable country on its side, which poses a great threat to Russia. Without this Sino-US conflict, it will take another 20 years for Russia's Far East and even Siberia to have a lot of trouble. This point Russia should be very clear.

After the communist revolution broke out in Russia, a large number of Russians fled to Shanghai, some of which lived in the 1950s and 1960s. It is believed that the independence movement from the Communist tyranny can gain the sympathy and support of the Russian people.

Splitting China should start with Tibet. The US government should assist Tibetans in exile to pass on information to Tibet. Not only must we pass on information to the Tibetan people, but we must also pass on the information blocked by the CCP to the Chinese Communists in Tibet. We transmitted the corruption information of the CCP's top officials to the military and police of the Chinese Communist Party in Tibet, and transmitted information on the assets of the CCP's high-level overseas to the military and police of the Chinese Communist Party in Tibet.

The US government should also assist the Tibetan people in launching an armed uprising. Even short-term occupation of some towns in the border areas of Tibet is of great significance to the independence movement.

topic.title: The United States assists China's independence to conform to Chinese traditional ethics and conforms to China's original justice.
topic.body:
If Confucius's doctrine represents China's traditional values â€‹â€‹and moral ethics, then the most fundamental one of Confucius's doctrine is "to destroy the country." The so-called "rejuvenation of the country" is to restore the states that have been destroyed.

The current China, or the country dominated by the Han people, was originally a small area. It is only from the Yellow River Basin to the plain area south of the Yangtze River, and only to the west of Hunan. And there are a large number of state-owned countries, known as the 800 princes.

These states do not know why, nor do they know when they started, and they have a common communist. This co-owner has no jurisdiction over the states, but has the power to command the world.

If a state has no reason to attack other states, using modern language to launch aggression, or the king of a state is inexhaustible, and modern language is a large-scale humanitarian crisis in the country, then the co-owner has power. Commanded the world and jointly crusted.

It can be seen that the eradication of the country and the destruction of the country have been in line with natural justice in ancient China.

The democratic United States is the natural co-owner of course. Assisting China's independence, restoring countries violently swallowed up, overthrowing the CCP's tyranny, that is, in line with China's ancient primitive justice, and in line with China's traditional morality since 2000.

topic.title: Trump must try his best to split China and end Chinaâ€™s autocratic tradition forever.
topic.body:
The development of science and technology to this day has already met the conditions for ending the autocratic tradition of China in 2000. Chinaâ€™s autocratic tradition in 2000 has been unable to break, and it has its objective conditions, not just subjective ideology.

There is no unified sense of autocracy in southern China. In China's 2000 centralized authoritarian history, only one time was the southern army's attack into the north, that is, the overthrow of the first centralized regime, the Qin Dynasty. After countless other dynasties, the regimes that emerged throughout the South were reluctant to cross the Yangtze River and enter the North.

Chinaâ€™s grand unified autocratic centralization has always been established by the northern regime. The South cannot prevent the northern regime from establishing a grandiose dictatorship. This is for objective reasons. Now the objective conditions for establishing a centralized system of authoritarianism no longer exist. Therefore, Trump should try his best to split China and end Chinaâ€™s autocratic tradition forever.

China can generally be divided into the north and the south by the Yangtze River. Northern China mainly produces wheat and miscellaneous grains, while southern China mainly produces rice. The language of the North China is very similar, and the basics can be understood everywhere in the North. The languages â€‹â€‹of the South China are completely different and cannot be understood by each other. This two parts of the north and the south are very different.

The northernmost part of southern China is the Yangtze River Delta. It is an alluvial plain and hilly area called â€œJiangnanâ€, the most affluent area in traditional China.

In ancient times, the military camp was in a difficult situation. It was very difficult to recruit troops in the "Jiangnan" area. No one wants to give up the affluent life of "Jiangnan" to be a soldier.

Going south to the south of the South China Sea, it was called "Baiyue" in ancient times. There are many mountains in the Baiyue area, and there are countless groups of tribes. The language and customs are different. inconvenient traffic. In the north, "Baiyue" is a mountain, meaning it has not yet developed. In the Western language, they are all indigenous peoples. Therefore, it is more difficult to recruit troops in the "Baiyue" area.

The northern region is completely different, and recruitment in the northern region is very easy. As long as someone pays for the troops, it is easy to pull up a team. This should be related to the general poverty in the northern region. The military camp life of several gimmicks in the day can attract young people in the north.

This phenomenon began in the Eastern Han Dynasty with Liu Xiu's rebellion and continued into modern times.

Liu Xiu is just an ordinary peasant. His family was blood-related to the royal family 200 years ago. The Liu Xiu generation is no longer wealthy and has no political status. However, it is such an ordinary landlord family that can recruit and build their own army. And soon it will be able to expand to the scale of confrontation with the central government.

Therefore, in the autocratic history of 2000, it was difficult for the South to expand its military strength. It was difficult to collect hundreds of thousands of troops, and it was impossible to conquer the North and establish a unified regime. On the contrary, it is easy for North China to collect millions of troops.

This is the fundamental reason why the southern regime cannot resist the invasion of the northern regime and the southern regime cannot be independent for a long time.

However, the development of modern science and technology has made war no longer rely solely on the number of people to win. The objective conditions for the pursuit of the unification of autocracy in the North China are no longer there. As long as China splits again, the South will be independent and will be permanently independent. The North has no longer been able to build a united country through military power.

Splitting China will end Chinaâ€™s oriental autocracy forever.

In this way, North Koreaâ€™s nuclear weapons problem will be solved and the missile problem will be solved. After Manchuria became independent, the CCPâ€™s threat to Japan was also resolved.

Manchuria is a region with abundant resources. Japan can help Manchuria to regain its country and also gain great benefits in Manchuria.

Japan, the United States, Russia, and India will certainly succeed in promoting Tibetâ€™s independence.
